Detailed Description

Holds information about a renderer.

Field Documentation

void* renderer_s::config

A pointer to a variable with configuration data specific to the renderer being used.

renderer_funcs* renderer_s::funcs

A renderer_funcs instance for this renderer.

level* renderer_s::lvl

The level to render.

char* renderer_s::output_path

The place where the image should be stored.
